why_flutter.text: Flutter has changed the game. Now you can transform your great ideas into applications from a single codebase that natively compiles for iOS, Android, Desktop, and Web. You can make the most of your productivity without having to waste time setting things up and still getting top-notch results.

development.text: Transform your ideas into high-quality products through a full development cycle. Together we can build your dreamed mobile app or web from scratch and achieve a before-and-after in your industry. From strategy and design to development and delivery we are your trusted Software Development team.

augmentation.title: Staff Augmentation
augmentation.text: Finding the right person with the precise skills to join your in-house team is an incredible hard and expensive task, plus it takes time. We have a solution to that! We can reinforce your existing team with ours by bringing experienced developers to effectively meet project timelines.

crimedoor.text: Crime database for the most notorious unsolved mysteries. You can be the detective and investigate the crime scenes with the use of augmented reality and other formats.

pay_my_trades.text: Pro Wallet is an instant payment solution for the construction industry that digitalizes and facilitates payment processes.

about_us.title: About us
about_us.text_1: Somnio Software is a Software development Company mainly focused on creating Mobile Applications with Flutter. Our mission is to help grow your business by transforming your ideas into high-quality products.
about_us.text_2: We are a team of passionate and creative engineers, developers and designers that work hand in hand with our clients in order to build the best solutions that meet their needs.

header.text_2: We are passionate engineers for passionate projects

info.text: We don't just create apps, we create world-class apps to help your business grow. Whether you want to create a product from scratch or you need an addition to your in-house team for a project, we are your trusted partner.

how_we_work.title: How we work
how_we_work.text_2: We base our work on an agile approach that involves adaptive planning, evolutionary development, early delivery, and continual improvement. Our team focuses their work on the Scrum methodology which helps us achieve higher productivity with flexible responses to changes. It helps us identify and solve problems more quickly and effectively.
how_we_work.text_4: It’s a human-centered way of thinking and working as well as a collection of methods. It promotes a deep interest in anticipating and better understanding the needs of the people you’re creating for. It involves a process of brainstorming and adopting a hands-on approach in prototyping and testing. This helps us observe and develop empathy with the target user in order to define it’s needs and challenges to ideate innovative solutions.

value_1.title: Passion
value_1.text: We are passionate about technology and it motivates us to keep growing and learning. We are a proactive and energetic team that really enjoys what they do.

value_2.title: Quality
value_2.text: We take each project with great responsibility and commitment in order to achieve the best result. Our dedication together with our experience and knowledge delivers excellence.

value_3.title: Empathy
value_3.text: We are centered in listening and deeply understanding the necessities of the client to provide advice and suggestions during the whole work process.

value_4.title: Clear Communication
value_4.text: We strongly believe that good and transparent communication can achieve a better understanding. That’s why we always maintain a fluent and careful dialogue.

value_5.title: Team Synergy
value_5.text: We trust that with a collaborative team we can achieve better results through the combination of knowledge, experiences, ideas and complementary talents.

value_6.title: Trust
value_6.text: Trust is the foundation of everything we do. We believe it’s the formula for strong and long-term relationships as well as successful and scalable projects.

why_us.title: Why us
why_us.text_1: We work with an empathetic approach to take the client’s needs as a priority and encourage the exchange of ideas and suggestions in order to achieve the best result.
why_us.text_2: Our team is continuously learning and staying updated with the latest technologies to keep improving and building better products.
why_us.text_3: Our experience and success stories are proof of what we are capable of achieving together. We are ready for new projects to help transform and succeed your business!

header.text_2: This is how we achieve outstanding results

how_we_work.title: What we do
how_we_work.text_2: We provide end-to-end development service to build your product from scratch. We have experience helping businesses grow with our products, from startups to big market players and for several industries such as education, healthcare, finance, entertainment, among others.
how_we_work.text_3: If you are looking for a trusted partner to help you turn your ideas into successful products, we are ready to get started!.
how_we_work.text_5: Increase your productivity with engineers prepared to successfully integrate with your team, process and workflow. We make outsourcing software development to Uruguay your best solution: talented professionals, reasonable time zone, cost-effective, high-quality work, similar work cultures with great English communication skills.
how_we_work.text_6: We focus on maintaining real-time communication to feel near and present at all times. It will feel as if we were working sitting side by side.

what_agency_say.title: What agencies say
what_agency_say.text: “Great IT teams are invaluable, you don’t always find IT team with agile mindset, customer focused, yet, with market insights, and great talent. Enjoy working with you, and looking forward to create a lasting success story.”
what_agency_say.name: Mohamad Dawas

process_1.title: Design Thinking
process_1.text: We focus on deeply understanding your business goals and user’s needs. Through this human-centered method we have a deep understanding of the user's needs and we are able to anticipate conduct and challenges in an effective and strategic way.

process_2.title: Requirements Survey
process_2.text: We use agile and SCRUM methodologies to gather requirements and start project management. We provide several tools so clients have insight of the project’s process and the possibility to directly and in real-time validate decisions or propose changes.

process_3.title: UX/UI
process_3.text: The UX/UI design process begins once the first version has been determined in the design thinking phase. We create the final interfaces and enable the client the possibility to test, interact and offer incremental feedback.

process_4.title: Software Architecture and Design
process_4.text: We use agile and SCRUM methodologies to gather requirements and start project management. We provide several tools so clients have insight of the project’s process and the possibility to directly and in real-time validate decisions or propose changes.

process_5.title: Development
process_5.text: We begin developing the functionalities considering all the previous steps. In this way, the developers can effectively create the product and arrive at the planned outcome.

process_6.title: QA Testing
process_6.text: During this stage, QA experts test the application and ensure the quality of the product. They build automated processes of these tests in order to be more time productive and cost-efficient. This prevents errors in production and causing discomfort in users when using the application.

process_7.title: Launch and Maintenance
process_7.text: The application is finally released to the world! We take care of the launch and make sure that it’s as optimal as possible. We completely have your back so there is no need for you to stress or worry. After the application is launched and running we continue to support it by taking care of the maintenance.

tool_1.text: Slack, a business internal communication tool, is the engine of our work. With this platform we gather our whole team and clients to stay connected, informed and updated.

tool_2.text: Jira is a project management tool for agile teams. It helps manage every project workflow as well as keeping every detail in sight in real-time so your team and client can stay on the same page through the whole process.

tool_3.text: Clockify is a time tracking app that helps us follow our work and time on projects. It helps keep an eye on our working progress and what the team is working on specifically.

tool_4.text: Confluence is a working tool that allows our team to create, collaborate and organize all of our work in one place. It not only centralizes our information, ideas and work, but also encourages contructive feedback between the team.

tool_5.text: Gsuite is a collection of enterprise-based products developed by Google. It is an incredible servce for communication, storage, administration, productivity and collaboration for our team and clients.

header.text_2: We create apps that transform businesses and simplify user’s lives

info.text_1: In Somnio Software we focus on creating high-quality, engaging and user-friendly apps to take your business to the next level. We offer an entire range of mobile app solutions, including UX/UI design, development, testing and maintenance.

covered.title: We’ve got you covered
covered.text_2: It’s the “behind the scenes” part of the development. Our back-end developers create the logic on which the app works and select the best technologies for each project.
covered.text_4: It’s what you see and what you use. Our developers take care of the layout, design and interactivity with modern technologies that allow faster programming with expressive interfaces and a native performance.

flutter_change_game.title: Flutter has changed the game
flutter_change_game.text_1: Somnio Software’s developers specialize in cross-platform application development with Flutter. We are experts in building better apps, faster and for any platform.
flutter_change_game.text_2: Flutter is our solution for productive, high-quality, and modern app development. We save the trouble of having multiple codes for different platforms and different working teams. This means Flutter improves efficiency while reducing costs and still achieving outstanding apps with native performance.

tech_list.title: We care about maintaining an excellent quality for your Web

agency_say.text_1: “They succesfully help us to increase our monthly incomes. We are completely satisfied with their services and we’d like to continue working with them.”

info.text_2: UI design will result in an instant attraction to you app/web. It is the process of creating the presentation and communication. It centers on the product’s look and interaction with the users. It includes each screen, page, buttons and other visual elements such as colors and typography. All in all, it’s the relationship between a person and the system they are using.
info.text_4: UX design is the process of creating a app/web that users want to use. It is the procedure of improving their experience when they interact with the product in order to achieve their maximum satisfaction. It mainly focuses on structuring all the components while taking into account functionality, design, integration and usability to create the user flow.

important.title: Why is UX/UI so important?
important.text_1: Design speaks to people and it’s the way they come to interpret your company. It’s important to create a human-centered design where you understand the needs of your users and the problems you intend to solve with your product.
important.text_2: Always keep in mind that users like apps and webs that are captivating, pleasing and easy to use. Developing an efficient UX/UI design will help improve the user experience and customer satisfaction, which will be the starting point for a successful product!

service_1.title: Information Architecture
service_1.text: IA focuses on designing the information structure of the product. It’s based on the business’s strategies to provide a clear and easy navigation for users.

service_2.title: Interactive Design
service_2.text: It’s all about creating a design that builds a beneficial relationship between the users and the product they interact with.

service_3.title: Usability Engineering
service_3.text: Apps and webs must be user-friendly and easy to navigate. Users need a simple and direct way of understanding information.

service_4.title: Wireframing
service_4.text: We create a sample of the application to test the look, usability and features.

service_5.title: Visual Design
service_5.text: It includes the whole appearance of the product. It has the power of affecting user’s behavior and therefore is one of the most important elements of UI design.

service_6.title: Prototype Development
service_6.text: The use of design samples enables quick changes and experiments upon constructive feedback.

vital.title: UX/UI is a vital part of our work process
vital.text_1: We take user experience and interface design very seriously in Somnio Software. We know that it plays a decisive part in your application or website being successful.
vital.text_2: That’s why we emphasize on researching the users needs, exchanging feedback with the client and being fully dedicated to achieving an attractive and engaging UX/UI design for your product.

header.text_1: Flutter transformed the future of Software Development

what_is_flutter.title: What is Flutter?
what_is_flutter.text_1: Flutter is a software development kit created by Google for building beautiful, natively compiled and high-performance applications for mobile, web and desktop from a single codebase.

characteristic_1.title: Fast programming and time-to-market
characteristic_1.text: Flutter’s hot reload feature enables seeing changes in real-time. It allows building UIs and experimentation in a quick and easy way, as well as fixing bugs faster. This results in a faster code development and allows you to skip many time-consuming steps which makes the process faster, more productive and speeds up time-to-market.

characteristic_2.title: Cross-platform
characteristic_2.text: It’s possible to build apps for all devices with a single codebase when using Flutter. With Flutter the app UI and logic maintain it’s consistency and don’t change depending on the platform. You need a single codebase and working team to create your product. The use of a cross-platform technology as Flutter saves time, effort and costs while achieving the same results.

characteristic_3.title: Native and smooth performance
characteristic_3.text: Flutter’s performance is indistinguishable from a native app, it not only has a native look but it provides a native performance. Contrary to most cross-platform frameworks, Flutter doesn’t rely on any intermediate code representations or interpretations. The app is built directly into the machine code which means it eliminates any performance bugs. As a result, the app will be fully compiled ahead of time, with a native performance and ready to launch.

characteristic_4.title: Better compatibility
characteristic_4.text: Flutter has its own widgets, which implies less communication between the app and the platform. Since they are part of the application and not the platform, you are likely to experience fewer or no compatibility issues in different versions. This means: fast application startup times, fewer overall performance issues and less time spent testing.

characteristic_5.title: Less testing
characteristic_5.text: Flutter not only saves time while writing code but also in testing and compiling data. The Quality Assurance process is faster because developers write automated tests only once since its the same codebase for multiple platform.

characteristic_6.title: Expressive and flexible UI
characteristic_6.text: The UI process is more flexible and versatile since it provides the possibility of customizing anything you see on screen. With Flutter this procedure is simple and adjustable regardless of the complexity of the components. It includes the use of elements for transitions, clipping, transformations and shape/color/shadow manipulations in a no-sweat way.

change_how_we_work.title: Flutter has changed the way we work
change_how_we_work.text: Google’s toolkit brings together the best of different languages ​​and frameworks to create the future of mobile business development. Even though, we can use other technologies if needed, it´s safe to say that flutter has definitely changed the way we develop apps.

card.text_1: If you want to know more about Flutter, don't miss our next Meetup

header.text_1: Frequently Asked Questions we have the answer to

question_1.title: What specific services do you provide?

content.text_1: We do the whole process of software engineer:
Somnio Software's collaborative team integrates different talents and areas such as software engineering, designing and marketing.
content.text_2: Our team has Front-End Developers (Mobile and Web), Back-End Developers and UX/UI designers. As we are focusing on Flutter, we have specialized Flutter Developers. We also have Project Managers and a CTO that is in charge of helping the team and supervising the quality of the code.
content.text_3: In Addition, we have a Digital Marketing and Business Development team.
content.text_4: Together we are a solid team that has experience in our specific areas, as well as working as a group.

question_3.title: How is your approach towards continuing learning and staying updated?

content.text_1: All of Somnio Software employees, regarding their level, are capacitated in platforms such as Udemy and Pluralsight. Besides, we provide training in our work place with the technical area of the company for about 3 or 5 weeks in order to complete, progress and elevate their profile.
content.text_2: In addition, we measure their performance in the platform Pluralsight where we create a Skill IQ to evaluate their work, capabilities and potential so we can have a profound insight in order to know where they need to be trained.
content.text_3: We even dedicate 2 hours per week so that each person can continue learning and training so they can grow in their specific area. Plus, we make every thursday “English Day” and we talk all day in English as a successful way to practice the language.

content.text_1: The process that we use to build an application is the full software engineer process. We make the consulting, requirements analysis, UI/UX interfaces, development, testing, launching and maintaining.
content.text_2: We start by deeply understanding the client’s needs through a really careful communication between parts, which includes many back and forth of it’s features.
content.text_3: Then we start making the UX/UI interfaces and deliver them to the clients, so that they can observe and take their time to fully understand the different screens. This is important because the client can visualize the app they will receive and it’s a guarantee of the outcome. In our experience, they are even better than what they imagined.
content.text_4: Following this, we start creating the product. First we build the architecture and design the software in order to start developing. During this process we frequently test the app in order to guarantee high quality products.
content.text_5: Finally, we launch the app with DevOps techniques which make our products fast integrable and assure their excellent quality.
content.text_6: With this process, clients obtain outstanding products that help bring their business to the next level.

question_2.title: What is the first thing you need from a client?

content.text_1: To begin the process of the project, I mostly require compromise, time and communication from clients.
content.text_2: The process starts with a deep understanding of the client’s needs. That's why we take our time to know our client's project idea so we can start. Afterwards, we share with them our techniques in order to understand what services and features helps them best to their business. Then it begins the development and analysis of our work while frequently communicating the different features till we achieve the desired results and the client is fully satisfied. This way of working has had outstanding results as we have always provided high valuable products to our clients.

question_1.title: Why Flutter and not React Native?

content.text_1: If you are planning on creating a fast, high-quality performance and native experience app, Flutter is the best option. For instance, React Native has a lot of problems with dependencies, the app crashes a lot, the environment its not that intuitive and well designed for developers, and the mobile heats a lot when running basic apps. On the opposite, Flutter provides a faster performance with a quicker developing time and an excellent experience for the user.

question_2.title: Why Flutter and not a Native code?

content.text_1: Flutter provides the same experience and performance than a Native code with the advantage of including faster programming, quicker time-to-market and the use of native codes if needed. In conclusion, why go through a long developing process with twice the developing costs if Flutter provides the same experience?
Even though Ionic provides a pretty fast development, the possibility to reuse the code from the web and it’s friendly for web developers, it lags behind other cross-plaforms such as Flutter.
content.text_2: For instance, it relies on web views to display the user interface of the app. A web view means that it launches a browser inside the application and this is a limiting factor when compared to techonology that provides a native performance. Both Ionic and Flutter use a single codebase across various platforms, but Ionic doesn’t provide a native experience while Flutter does, as it compiles into a native code.

question_4.title: Why Flutter and not a PWA?

content.text_1: A Pwa is a web application that can be opened in a web browser on any device, but even though it strives to deliver a native app experience it does not acomplish it completely. For instance, it’s browser-dependent, it isn’t easy to access the hardware, for example the bluetooth modules and it doesn’t have push notifications. It doesn’t work like a mobile application since it has to access the Internet to look and load some things. This means that it takes more time. On the other hand, Flutter is Google’s SDK for creating cross-platform application that provides high quality performances with a native experience and flexible and expressive UI.

question_5.title: Why is Flutter faster to develop?

content.text_1: To use Flutter you do not need to hire both Android and iOS developers, since it uses one codebase for all platforms. You also do not need to maintain two different repositories. In addition, it provides a quick compilation which allows the developer to visualize the results of a change in the code in real time.

question_6.title: Why is Flutter twice less cost?

content.text_1: You don’t have to afford both Android and IOS developers and build the same thing twice! This is one of Flutter’s strongest suits: it uses one codebase for all platforms. So, the reason why is faster is almost the same of why it costs less. This is a great advantage that makes the difference.

question_1.title: How fast can you build my project?

content.text_1: It really depends on the project. Nevertheless, with each project, we focus on delivering the quicker outcome possible by following an efficient process. Once we gather the requirements and deeply understand the project goal we deliver estimations of the expected time.
content.text_2: There are several conditions that help us be prepared to build your project in the needed time, no extra. For instance, we train our team in their area of expertise and encourage team synergy to complement their talents. Their skills next to their experience working together allows them to work faster, more effectively, and achieve high-level results. Plus, we have tech libraries to speed things up by reusing solutions without wasting time reinventing the wheel.

content.text_1: We work by hourly rate for our projects. We provide an estimation in hours for what a functionality or change can take. You can always take your time to decide in order to prioritize depending on the value of an addition or change. We like to emphasize that no decision is final, you can always re-evaluate a choice and make changes.
content.text_2: This gives us flexibility to easily make changes in the app if they are needed without having to stick to a contract. It’s easier and faster to include requirements, make changes or remove functionalities.
content.text_3: We give you an estimation of the hours but it’s not the final value. We will frequently compare the time planned with the actual progress to check if there is any deviation in order to understand why it happened and look for possible solutions together.
content.text_4: This way the flow of the project is more fluent. In our experience, both sides are more comfortable working by hours since we can work much faster and in a natural and comfortable way.
content.text_5: In the end, the product we delivery has a higher quality and value given that there are fewer obstacles and bureaucracy during the process to make changes and adjust the product.
